incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to AT&T US Network

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AT&T US Network Via a Subset Of 10 DLC Long code. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incidents.name: Issues With A2P API

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with A2P API, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with A2P API. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: EC2 Limits

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with EC2, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29

incidents.name: Sync - Unable to Orchestrate Updates

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with Sync, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Sync. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Studio: 5xx from Workflow Gateway and Workflow Engine

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with Studio: 5xx from Workflow Gateway and Workflow Engine, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Studio. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Stargate 500

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are still experiencing issues with Stargate, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of HTTP 500 errors . Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Event Streams cannot create new subscriptions or sinks

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with Event Streams cannot create new subscriptions or sinks, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Event Streams. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Video Rooms, Video Recordings and Media Compositions are down

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with Video Rooms, Video Recordings and Media Compositions are down, however, we have consolidated all impacting products in to one incident. You can check the status of this here: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/2mjg0mr2pf29
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Video. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Elevated Errors Affecting Multiple Products

incident_updates.body: We are continuing our investigation and have discovered Programmable Messaging - Whatsapp and RCS media are affected by the Elevated Errors Affecting Multiple Products. We will provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body:
We are seeing partial recovery and are scaling systems to handle the influx of traffic. Programmable Messaging and Programmable Voice are fully recovered. However we are still experiencing outages across multiple product lines due to an ongoing AWS incident( https://health.aws.amazon.com/health/status ) with their US1 Region. AWS has confirmed EC2 is impacted as well.

We have activated our incident response team and have all hands on deck working on remediation. We are partnering directly with AWS on the incident and have also escalated to their leadership. At this time we do not recommend trying to take any failover action to alternative Regions. We will provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Call Failures from TIM Network Subscribers in Brazil to a subset of Twilio's Numbers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound calls to Twilio Brazil Phone Numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We continue seeing recovery for inbound calls to Twilio Brazil phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for inbound calls to Twilio Brazil phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We still continue to observe call failures to Twilio phone numbers from TIM Network Subscribers in Brazil. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inconsistent Filtering May Have Caused Failed Deliveries for Inbound Messages

incident_updates.body: Between October 16, 2025, at 21:15 UTC and October 17, 2025, at 19:45 UTC, some inbound SMS messages to Twilio accounts may have failed to be delivered, resulting in error code 30038. This issue was caused by an unexpected behavior following a filtering change. The change has since been reverted, and inbound SMS traffic is now processing as expected.

incidents.name: Outbound Call Failure To a Subset Of Hungary Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner has informed us that the Hungarian regulator NMHH has begun enforcing Decree 4/2012 (I.24.), which introduces new screening and blocking obligations for calls terminating in Hungary via international interconnection points that present Hungarian Caller IDs.

To avoid disruptions in call delivery to Hungarian destinations, we recommend the following actions:

Recommended Steps:

- Avoid using Hungarian CLIs (+36 numbers) as Caller IDs on calls into Hungary unless you have a valid domestic interconnection or roaming agreement to justify their use.
- Where possible, use non-Hungarian CLIs, such as your main business number or an international service number.
You can quickly provision U.S. numbers (+1) in the Twilio Console and use those for calls to Hungarian recipients.
- Monitor your call completion rates to Hungarian destinations.

If you observe abnormal failure patterns, please reach out to Twilio Support for further assistance.

Well provide another update on 10/20/2025 at 12:00 PM PT or sooner as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Serverless production boxes lost connection with AuroraDB

incident_updates.body: Between 12:04 AM UTC - 12:14 AM UTC , we experienced database connection issues with RDS Proxy and AuroraDB, however the issue has auto-recovered. Our engineering team has confirmed full recovery of our systems. We are investigating further to understand the root cause of the connection drops.

incidents.name: TaskRouter API Failing to Update Flex Worker Skills

incident_updates.body: The TaskRouter API for updating worker skills in Flex is now operating normally. This incident is now resolved.

We have started seeing recovery for the issue where the TaskRouter API was failing to update worker skills in Flex causing errors when supervisors attempted to modify skills. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an issue where the TaskRouter API is failing to update worker skills in Flex causing errors when supervisors attempt to modify skills. Our engineering team is actively working to identify the root cause and implement a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Flex. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
